# rv

[![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.org/jsta/rv.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/jsta/rv)

The goal of rv is to provide tools for simulation-based random variables

## Installation

You can install the development version of `rv` from [Github](https://github.com/jsta/rv) with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("jsta/rv")
```
